ComicInfo.Title: Hell Chapter VI: The Lake of Fire
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter's Tales of Science Fiction: Hell
ComicInfo.Summary: Battered and burned from their engagement with the savage insectoid Stalkers, the CalEx strike team is now fractured into three parts, all lost in the Underneath: Brandon Samples, alone and suffocating; Stef, half-blinded, her group ravaged by the conflict in the Crystal Cathedral; and the remnants of Capt. Lamb's unit, captured and herded by more Stalkers than anyone can fight. At the end of their quest: actual demonic gargoyles, the overlords of the Underneath! They're not only in charge - but they already know how to speak English!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 21:56:17. [CVDB887049] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:23:11. [Issue ID 2560730]
ComicInfo.Writer: David J. Schow,David Schow,David J. Schow
